overview: Director Tony Alizzi turns the sexual volume way up to create a highly erotic experience. End result? "Sex Pigs: Volume One" is a raunchy masterwork. Each pairing begins and ends on a high note, and not a moment lags in between. No bullshit, just outstanding sucking, rimming and fucking. The action takes place at The Zone ( http://TheZoneLA.com ), a private sex club in Los Angeles for men. An establishment, of course, with all the necessary equipment (slings, glory holes, rimming stations, etc.) for a good time.
title: Sex Pigs
